name: Keycloak
description:
Expand the existing Keycloak integration by enabling data transfer from Axon Ivy to Keycloak
  – unlocking advanced use cases like user approvals and dynamic identity management. Seamless, secure, and efficient.

descriptions.value:
Expand the existing Keycloak integration by enabling data transfer from Axon Ivy to Keycloak
  – unlocking advanced use cases like user approvals and dynamic identity management. Seamless, secure, and efficient.
Erweitere die bestehende Keycloak-Integration: Übertrage Daten von Axon Ivy an Keycloak mit diesem Konnektor – und ermögliche Use Cases wie Benutzerfreigaben und dynamisches Identitätsmanagement.
